Title: Relates to applications for enhanced attorneys fees in medical, dental or podiatric malpractice cases
Summary: Updates the procedure for applying for attorney's fees in medical, dental or podiatric malpractice cases in excess of the statutory contingent fee schedule in circumstances where the amounts set forth in such fee schedule are inadequate to compensate the attorney for the legal services rendered.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the judiciary law, in relation to applications for enhanced attorney's fees in medical, dental and podiatric malpractice cases
